SEARCH
Module Mal4J
Package dev.katsute.mal4j

Class MyAnimeList

java.lang.Object
dev.katsute.mal4j.MyAnimeList
public abstract class MyAnimeList extends Object
The MyAnimeList API interface, used to execute requests with the API from Java.

The MyAnimeList class can be created by authenticating with either:
  • A client ID using withClientID(String)
  • A token using withToken(String)
  • OAuth2 using withOAuth2(MyAnimeListAuthenticator).
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
3.2.0
Author:
Katsute

    • withClientID

      public static MyAnimeList withClientID(String client_id)
      Creates an interface with a client ID. Only public read operations are allowed, for write and user operations use withToken(String) or withOAuth2(MyAnimeListAuthenticator). Client secret is not required if your application has one.
      Parameters:
      client_id - client id
      Returns:
      MyAnimeList
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if client ID is null
      Since:
      2.6.0
      See Also:
      • withToken(String)
      • withOAuth2(MyAnimeListAuthenticator)

    • withToken

      public static MyAnimeList withToken(String token)
      Creates an interface with an OAuth token. Note that this method does not support refreshToken().
      Parameters:
      token - OAuth token, Ex: 'Bearer oauth2token'
      Returns:
      MyAnimeList
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if token is null
      InvalidTokenException - if token doesn't start with 'Bearer'
      Since:
      2.6.0
      See Also:
      • withClientID(String)
      • withOAuth2(MyAnimeListAuthenticator)

      public abstract AnimeRankingQuery getAnimeRanking(String rankingType)
      Returns an Anime ranking query.

      ranked Anime
